metadata.description: Powerful AI workflow orchestrator for Rails, iOS Swift, and Android Kotlin. 3 intelligent skills that supercharge development while you stay in control. Tools, not automation. Bilingual English/French.

plugins.name: orchestrator
plugins.description: 3 orchestrated workflow skills: plan (core/expansion PRDs with auto-context), implement (code + auto-test + auto-review + progress), ship (commit + PR with approval gates). Context-aware, pattern-driven, power-user focused.
